mosinstall.name: A Featured Module
mosinstall.author: rabencor
mosinstall.description: This module will display box with an image, link or text, as a featured thing.

param.name: img
param.label: Image Path:
param.description: Path of the image in the form: /pathoftheimage/image

param.name: imgw
param.label: Image Width:
param.description: The image's width is autodetected but you can force it using this parameter

param.name: imgh
param.label: Image Height:
param.description: The image's height is autodetected but you can force it using this parameter

param.name: link
param.label: Display a link under the image?
param.description: Select yes if you want to place a link under the image.

param.name: link_window
param.label: Open Link in new window?
param.description: Select yes if you want the link to open in a new window.

param.name: text
param.label: Display a text under the image?
param.description: Select yes if you want to place some text under the image by filling parameters below.

param.name: text_txt
param.label: Text:
param.description: Text to show under the image.

param.name: frame
param.label: Display a frame around the content?
param.description: Select yes to display a frame around the whole content.

param.name: framebg
param.label: Frame Background Color:
param.description: Background color of the frame, use HEX format: #000000

param.name: framebw
param.label: Frame Border Width:
param.description: Will display a border around the frame, set to 0 for no border.

param.name: framebcolor
param.label: Frame Border Color:
param.description: You can set the color of the frame's border, use HEX format: #000000
